price: Nagsugo Kami sa kanya sa isang daang libo o nakahihigit sila.
arabic: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِاْئَةِ أَلۡفٍ أَوۡ يَزِيدُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-arsalnāhu ilā mi-ati alfin aw yazīdūna
